title: Privacy/Marketing Preferences (Consent)
description: This schema captures privacy, personalization and marketing preferences (consents).

choice-value.title: Choice Value
choice-value.description: The value specified by the user as their preference

basis-of-processing.title: Basis Of Processing
basis-of-processing.description: Legal basis for collecting/processing data: is user consent required?

timestamp.title: Preference timestamp
timestamp.description: Time this specific preference was collected.

source.title: Preference Source
source.description: Through which interface did the user provide this preference value

xdm:choice.description: The value specified by the user as their consent choice

xdm:timestamp.title: Consent timestamp
xdm:timestamp.description: Time this specific consent was collected.

xdm:source.title: Consent Source
xdm:source.description: Through which interface did the user provide this consent value

xdm:sellData.title: Sell Data
xdm:sellData.description: Selling of user's Data to 2nd or 3rd parties is permitted

xdm:shareData.title: Share Data
xdm:shareData.description: Sharing of user's Data with 2nd or 3rd parties is permitted

xdm:pseudonymousAnalysis.title: Pseudonymous Analysis
xdm:pseudonymousAnalysis.description: Data can be used for analysis that may include an ID that may or may not be tied to an actual person

xdm:deviceLinking.title: Device Linking
xdm:deviceLinking.description: Attempts to link multiple devices belonging to an individual or household are permitted

xdm:anyPersonalization.title: General Personalization Preference
xdm:anyPersonalization.description: Is permission granted to perform any type of personalization

xdm:email.title: Personalize email
xdm:email.description: Allow personalization of emails sent to the user

xdm:physicalMail.title: Personalize physical mail
xdm:physicalMail.description: Allow personalization of offers sent via traditional/physical mail

xdm:pushNotifications.title: Personalize push notifications
xdm:pushNotifications.description: Personalization of push notifications is permitted

xdm:sms.title: Personalize SMS
xdm:sms.description: Personalization of text messages is permitted

xdm:phoneCalls.title: Personalize phone calls
xdm:phoneCalls.description: Allow phone calls that the brand initiates to be personalized based on the user's interests or behavior

xdm:iotDevices.title: Personalize IoT Devices
xdm:iotDevices.description: Personalization of interactions with IoT devices is permitted

xdm:socialMedia.title: Personalize Social Media
xdm:socialMedia.description: Personalization of interactions on Social Media sites/apps is permitted

xdm:inAppMessages.title: Personalize in-app messages
xdm:inAppMessages.description: Allow personalization of messages displayed within my apps

xdm:inVehicle.title: Personalize in-vehicle
xdm:inVehicle.description: Personalization of in-vehicle experiences is permitted

xdm:inHome.title: Personalize in-home
xdm:inHome.description: Personalization of in-home experiences is permitted

xdm:inStore.title: Personalize in-store
xdm:inStore.description: Personalization of in-store experiences is permitted

xdm:content.title: Personalize content
xdm:content.description: Allow personalization of the content on my site or in my apps

xdm:offers.title: Personalize Offers
xdm:offers.description: Allow personalization of 1st-party offers displayed on this site or with this app

xdm:customerSupport.title: Personalize customer support
xdm:customerSupport.description: Allow customer support to personalize responses/suggestions based on user's interests or behavior

xdm:thirdPartyOffers.title: Personalize
xdm:thirdPartyOffers.description: Personalization of third-party offers/ads displayed on this brand's sites or apps is permitted

xdm:thirdPartyContent.title: Personalize
xdm:thirdPartyContent.description: Personalization of third-party content displayed on this brand's sites or apps is permitted

xdm:advertising.title: Personalize Ads
xdm:advertising.description: Personalization of this brand's ads on third-party sites/apps is permitted

xdm:preferredChannel.title: Preferred Channel
xdm:preferredChannel.description: User's preferred channel for receiving communications

xdm:anyMarketing.title: General Direct Marketing Preference
xdm:anyMarketing.description: Does user permit any type of direct marketing

xdm:physicalMail.title: Receive physical mail
xdm:physicalMail.description: User agrees to being contacted via traditional/physical mail.

xdm:sms.title: Receive SMS
xdm:sms.description: User agrees to receive text messages

xdm:phoneCalls.title: Receive phone calls
xdm:phoneCalls.description: The brand may contact the user via phone

xdm:iotMessages.title: Receive IoT messages
xdm:iotMessages.description: It is okay to interact with the user via IoT devices

xdm:socialMedia.title: Receive Social Media Messages
xdm:socialMedia.description: It is okay to send messages to the user on their social media accounts

xdm:inAppMessages.title: Receive in-app messages
xdm:inAppMessages.description: User permits messages to be shown within the brands's apps

xdm:inVehicleMessages.title: Receive in-vehicle messages
xdm:inVehicleMessages.description: It is okay to interact with the user via technology installed in the user's vehicle

xdm:inHomeMessages.title: Receive in-home messages
xdm:inHomeMessages.description: It is okay to interact with the user via technology installed in the user's home

xdm:version.title: Consent Schema Version
xdm:version.description: Version of the Consents and Preferences Schema

xdm:timestamp.title: Consent/Preferences timestamp
xdm:timestamp.description: Timestamp of this complete set of user consents and preferences

xdm:source.title: Consent/Preferences source
xdm:source.description: Through which interface did the user provide their choices for this complete set of user consents and preferences

xdm:userCountryRegionCode.title: User Country (and optionally Region) Code
xdm:userCountryRegionCode.description: ISO 3166 alpha2 country code or ISO 3166-2 country plus state/province code for use in helping to determine how to interpret consent values

xdm:countryRegionSource.title: Country/Region Source
xdm:countryRegionSource.description: Method used to determine the user's country/region

xdm:choicesMetadata.title: Consent and Preference Metadata
xdm:choicesMetadata.description: Metadata that applies to all consents and preferences that don't specify a different value
